m_szDocTitle: The World's First Fuel-Cell Car-Sharing Program Will Open In Germany | Co.Exist | ideas + impact
m_szDocSumamry: 1 minute read The World's First Fuel-Cell Car-Sharing Program Will Open In Germany The service wants to create a market for hydrogen vehicles, which have been slow to develop. 01 /05 Hydrogen cars are stuck in a chicken-and-egg problem, with not enough filling stations to create a real market for the cars (and vice versa). 02 /05 To break the impasse, Linde, a big industrial gases company in Germany, is getting into the transportation business. 03 /05 From this summer, it's launching the world's first car sharing service for hydrogen cars. 04 /05 It hopes Germans will think differently about h
